sentence.Network_en: The kitten was black with white front paws and a white splotch on her chest.
sentence.Network_cn: 那只黑色小猫长着白色前爪，胸口上有一块白斑。

sentence.Network_en: There was still the rayed splotch in the upper right - hand corner where a tear had fallen.
sentence.Network_cn: 菜单的右上角还留着一块被泪滴打湿的放射状的污痕.

sometimes she sells even rarer heirloom varieties like the Moon and Stars , which is larger still and whose deep green rind is stippled with what look like splotches of yellow paint .有时她会少量供应较为传统的瓜类，例如“星月”，这种瓜个儿更大，更绿，果皮上还有黄色的条纹。

I love the hiss and pop of vinyl and the black splotch in the corner when a movie changes reels.I enjoyed the hushed , uneven ticking of a windup watch.I love handwriting .我沉醉于电影胶片带动转轴时那斯斯的声音和影片角落里的黑色斑点，喜欢那种上了发条的手表在安静中发出的嘀嘀嗒嗒声，还钟情于用手写的方式来表达自我。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: perhaps a blend of spot and obsolete plotch 'blotch'

entry.tran: (尤指某种液体的)大块污渍，大斑块
entry.def: A splotch is a large uneven mark or stain, especially one that has been caused by a liquid.

auth_sentence.content: When a chimp is asleep, dab a splotch of paint on its forehead.

auth_sentence.content: The flush on one of her cheeks slides into a splotch of pale brown as big as a handprint.
